findings.aboutContent: Contemporary Media Solutions (CMS) is a Business Website Development & Media Marketing Agency in Nigeria, registered under Corporate Affairs Commission as “Contem Media Solutions”.The aim of the Contemporary Media Solutions is to render strategic, innovative business solutions and marketing consultancy services to Startup and Small businesses that want to break into their service market as well as businesses that want to improve on and maintain their customer base using contemporary marketing strategies, services and tools through Websites, Graphics, Social Media and Mobile Apps.Our goal is to
